655750.name: Trigger Spree
655750.description:
KNOWN FEATURES ::

  • Multiplayer pick up and play FPS action

  • So many guns ranging from experimental, scifi, alien, etc

  • Maps you wanna spend time and live in

  • Character cast includes frogmen, humans, aliens, robots, mech cat

  • Satisfying movement with speed and momentum

  • Jetpack - Optional mode which changes the entire gameplay dynamic

  • Aesthetic Sleek Style

  • Every map has a bathroom

  • Drink soda from vending machines, or blow up and make cans fly all over

  • Arcade machines to play full arcade games! Watch your back since players may shoot you

  • Destructible stuff like lights, windows, toilets, cars, watermelons

KNOWN WEAPONS ::

  • Nade-balla - fire a Nadeball that rolls and remotely detonate

  • U22i - chunky loud sub machine gun, not too accurate

  • Acid Nozzle - high-powered "watergun" that shoots face-melting acid 

  • Laser Pistol - bounce lasers off the wall with this alien weapon

  • G.T.A.R. - guitar Type Audio Rifle, shatter your opponents with guitar riffs

  • Fireworx - shoot fireworks, don't get distracted by the beautiful explosion

  • Cybergun - fast pistol from the year 2070

  • Disco-deathball - inaccurate spinning multi-colored laser mini gun

  • Railgun - 1 shot = 1 kill, uses quarters and has to charge

  • Cointoss - a shiny silenced shotgun

  • Flamer - char your enemies or create a wall of flames to block them

  • Extinguisher - extinguish flames with foam piles that take 1 HP

  • tons more

KNOWN MAPS ::

  • Area 57 - By the time the public knew the purpose of this facility, it was too late. 

  • Backroom - This musty pocket dimension is used for testing.

  • Mall - 1000s of people used to shop here, now its a ghost town.

  • Resort - A tropical vacation spot with free boat tours and expensive gelato.

  • Mothership - This vessel has been floating through space for centuries.

NOTES ::

Inspired by Goldeneye , Halo , Perfect Dark , Timesplitters , Counterstrike , Half-Life , cs

All info in this page subject to change. Game currently uses listen servers for online play.
